mapper.select: select NO as no, SUBJECT as subject, CONTENT as content, CREATED as creatEd FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1 order by NO limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (SUBJECT, CONTENT, CREATED) VALUES(#{subject}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select NO as no, SUBJECT as subject, CONTENT as content, CREATED as creatEd FROM BOARD WHERE NO = #{no}
